snippet: In David H. Petraeus’s state of residence, Virginia, as in 22 others, adultery remains a criminal act, a vestige of the way the law has tried to anchor sexual activity within marriage.
abstract: Adulterous affair David H Petraeus had with his biographer Paula Broadwell is illegal in Virginia, his state of residence, as it is in 22 other states, vestige of way American law has anchored legitimate sexual activity within marriage.
lead_paragraph: In David H. Petraeus’s state of residence, Virginia, as in 22 others, adultery remains a criminal act, a vestige of the way the law has tried to anchor sexual activity within marriage.

headline.seo: Adultery, an Ancient Crime Still on Many Books
headline.main: Adultery, an Ancient Crime That Remains on Many Books
headline.print_headline: Adultery, an Ancient Crime That Remains on Many Books
